addition.item: Added Joomla 5.4+ / 6+ and PHP 8.1+ through 8.4+ support
Added comprehensive input validation for all date and timezone fields
Added fallback values for all calendar settings
Added additional user-facing security and prevention methods

fix.item: Fixed "Array to string conversion" error that prevented calendar from displaying
Fixed JavaScript syntax errors caused by invalid timezone or date values
Fixed PHP warnings on undefined properties in PHP 8.x
Fixed calendar not rendering when timezone was set to "local"
Fixed recurring events not displaying when end date was invalid

remove.item: Removed Joomla 3 support and legacy/deprecated code
Removed direct $_POST superglobal usage (now uses Joomla Input class) Security

fix.item: Thanks to user Francis Valenzuela for helping update the print code for a better printing/user experience.
Minor code revisions and updates.

remove.item: htmlspecialchars() removed from content filter so html is rendered correctly. Dynamic content shouldn't be affected by this change. Text editors or raw code can now be edited or updated without issues.

addition.item: Added a div and id "cal-email-cloak" to the Email Cloak tag so it may be manually manipulated via css if required. NOTE: This is only shown when the Joomla Email Cloak plugin is disabled.

fix.item: Changed "Modal Title" to just the "Title" to show the correct title when opening a modal window/pop-up on each event.
Updated FullCalendar Base JS Version to: 6.1.18

addition.item: Recurring by specific days has been added in per event. NOTE: There is a larger known issue where your event may jump to a day before or a day after your desired day based on your time zone selection. Just choose a different day to offset it, or change the time on your event a few hours one way or another at this time.

fix.item: Changed some of the test date, time and time zone text in the modals.
Refactored some code and cleaned up a minor time error if no time zone was selected.
Changed Text Color in each Calendar item to override the default main text color in settings. This only works when a background color is used, like a multi day event or timeline view.
Moved "Event Text Color" in Main Calendar Pro element settings so you can set a default text color.
Added a "Show Past Events" option to force all events in the past dates to show.

addition.item: Custom End Dates are still available with the optional checkbox that's now added to limit the end date.

fix.item: Changed "Limit End Date" to include preset time periods from today's date (i.e. 1 month, 1 year, etc.).
Minor custom changes and code cleanup to prevent a date bug.

addition.item: Included the option to globally hide the date title

fix.item: Fixed default "local" time zone to use the user's browser time to avoid errors.
Fixed date headers showing for future events if maz events were limited
Minor code changes and clearup for dates, time zones and max events

addition.item: If Modal is disabled, the event link can be used when the event is clicked on

fix.item: Reorganized options in the main element view for Display & Modal/Link options
Event would disappear when modal options were disabled.

addition.item: If loading is needed for more events, a loading icon will now show. This is rare in most setups.
Lazy loading for when a lot of events are needing to load at once.
"Hide Past Events From Today" as an option for the "Limit Start Date" of events that will always use "today's" date.

fix.item: Move some code around to work better with multiple events needing the date/time/timezone, etc.
Fixed update URL
"Start Date" now works as expected
Print fuction updated and print button only prints calendar now.
Refactored some code and scripts for better loads
Search Bar style fix & better reset reliability

addition.item: Calendar Pro Element - First Release for YOOtheme Pro
